hansen: Datasets and Unofficial Solutions from 'Econometrics' by Bruce E. Hansen

hansen-package.Rd

This package provides datasets from the book 'Econometrics' by Bruce E. Hansen <isbn:9780691235899> along with unofficial refactored code using 'cpp11armadillo' to show 'cpp11armadillo' usage. The original datasets were adapted from multiple sources, including: Arellano and Bond (1991) doi:10.2307/2297968 ; Acemoglu, Johnson, and Robinson (2001) doi:10.1257/aer.91.5.1369 ; Angrist and Krueger (1991) doi:10.2307/2937954 ; Angrist and Lavy (1999) doi:10.1162/003355399556061 ; Bernheim, Meer and Novarro doi:10.1257/pol.20130351 ; the Bureau of Labor Statistics; Card (1995) doi:10.3386/w4483 ; Cox, Hansen and Jimenez (2004) doi:10.1016/S0047-2727(03)00069-0 ; Card, Mas and Rothstein (2008) doi:10.1162/qjec.2008.123.1.177 ; Duflo, Duppas and Kremer (2011) doi:10.1257/aer.101.5.1739 ; Di Tella and Schargrodsky (2004) doi:10.1257/000282804322970733 ; McCracken and Ng (2015) doi:10.20955/wp.2015.012 ; Hall and Hall (1993) doi:10.2307/2534602 ; Kilian (2009) doi:10.1257/aer.99.3.1053 ; Koppelman and Wen (2000) doi:10.1016/S0191-2615(99)00012-0 ; Wen and Koppelman (2001) doi:10.1016/S0191-2615(00)00045-X ; Ludwig and Miller (2007) doi:10.1162/qjec.122.1.159 ; Mankiw, Romer and Weil (1992) doi:10.2307/2118477 ; Nerlove (1963); Papageorgiou, Saam and Schulte (2017) doi:10.7910/DVN/67QCH2 ; Reinhardt and Rogoff (2010) doi:10.1257/aer.100.2.573 .
